div.bibl: Dziennik Zwiazkowy, March 3, 1909. POLISH PEOPLE'S UNIVERSITY

body.p: Regular lectures to be given this week at the Alliance Hall 102-104 W. Division St. at 8:30 p.m.
Wednesday, Polish Literature, by R. Mazurkiewicz.
Friday, Polish Literature, by R. Mazurkiewicz.
Sunday, March 7, at Park No.1 Hall, at 3 p.m.
Lecture on the Women's Movements, by Miss K. Walukiewicz. Bridgeport at Michiewicz's Hall, Evolution of Life by Dr. Kalionowski.
Town of Lake, Tuberculosis, by Dr. K. Zurawski.
